00020 #include "SMDFileData.h"
00021 #include <sys/stat.h>

00023 #ifdef _MSC_VER
00024 #define snprintf _snprintf
00025 #endif

00028 static const std::string SummarySec     = "SUMMARY";
00029 
00031 static const std::string Frames         = "NumberOfFrames";
00032 
00034 static const std::string FrameCols      = "FramesPerRow";
00035 
00037 static const std::string FrameRows      = "FramesPerCol";
00038 
00040 static const std::string KeyRows                = "Rows";
00041 
00043 static const std::string KeyCols                = "Cols";
00044 
00046 static const std::string KeyStartRow    = "StartRow";
00047 
00049 static const std::string KeyStartCol    = "StartCol";

00051 using namespace affxsmd;

00053 /*
00054  * Constructor
00055  */
00056 SMDFrame::SMDFrame()
00057 {
00058         // Initialize to an invalid frame.
00059         frameIdx = -1;
00060         rows = -1;
00061         cols = -1;
00062         startRow = -1;
00063         startCol = -1;
00064 }

00082 /*
00083  * Check for the file existance
00084  */
00085 bool SMDFileData::Exists()
00086 {
00087         // Find the file stats.
00088         struct stat st;
00089         return (stat(filename.c_str(), &st) == 0);
00090 }
00091 
00092 /*
00093  * Get the SMDFrame information for a frame.
00094  */
00095 SMDFrame SMDFileData::GetFrame(unsigned int frameIdx)
00096 {
00097         if (frameIdx >= 0 && frameIdx < smdFrames.size())
00098         {
00099                 return smdFrames[frameIdx];
00100         }
00101         else
00102         {
00103                 SMDFrame invalidFrame;
00104                 return invalidFrame;
00105         }
00106 }
00107 
00108 /*
00109  * Read the SMD file.
00110  */
00111 bool SMDFileData::Read()
00112 {
00113         if (filename.length() == 0)
00114                 return false;
00115 
00116         isRead = ReadData();
00117         return isRead;
00118 }
00119 
00120 /*
00121  * Read the SMD data.
00122  */
00123 bool SMDFileData::ReadData()
00124 {
00125         Clear();
00126 
00127         CIniFile iniFile;
00128         std::vector<CIniFile::Record> allRecords = iniFile.GetAllRecords(filename);
00129         
00130         if (allRecords.size() == 0)
00131                 // Either the file does not exist or is not the correct format.
00132                 return false;   
00133 
00134         int numFrames = 0;
00135         if (GetIntValue(allRecords, SummarySec, Frames, numFrames) == false)
00136                 return false;
00137 
00138         if (numFrames < 1)
00139                 return false;
00140 
00141         int numRows = 0;
00142         if (GetIntValue(allRecords, SummarySec, FrameRows, numRows) == false)
00143                 return false;
00144 
00145         int numCols = 0;
00146         if (GetIntValue(allRecords, SummarySec, FrameCols, numCols) == false)
00147                 return false;
00148 
00149         frameRows = numRows;
00150         frameCols = numCols;
00151 
00152         for (int iFrame = 0; iFrame < numFrames; ++iFrame)
00153         {
00154                 SMDFrame frame;
00155                 char sectionName[10];
00156                 snprintf(sectionName,sizeof(sectionName), "%d", iFrame);
00157 
00158                 frame.frameIdx = iFrame;
00159 
00160                 if (GetIntValue(allRecords, sectionName, KeyRows, frame.rows) == false)
00161                         return false;
00162                 if (GetIntValue(allRecords, sectionName, KeyCols, frame.cols) == false)
00163                         return false;
00164                 if (GetIntValue(allRecords, sectionName, KeyStartRow, frame.startRow) == false)
00165                         return false;
00166                 if (GetIntValue(allRecords, sectionName, KeyStartCol, frame.startCol) == false)
00167                         return false;
00168         
00169                 smdFrames.push_back(frame);
00170         }
00171         
00172         return true;
00173 }
00174 
00175 /*
00176  * Clear all members except filename.
00177  */
00178 void SMDFileData::Clear()
00179 {
00180         smdFrames.clear();
00181         frameRows = 0;
00182         frameCols = 0;
00183         isRead = false;
00184 }
00185 
00186 /*
00187  * Find a Record in a collection.
00188  * Move into CIniFile?
00189  */
00190 CIniFile::Record* SMDFileData::FindRecord(std::vector<CIniFile::Record>& records, std::string section, std::string key)
00191 {
00192         for (std::vector<CIniFile::Record>::iterator ii = records.begin(); ii != records.end(); ++ii)
00193         {
00194                 if (ii->Key == key && ii->Section == section)
00195                         return &(*ii);
00196         }
00197         return 0;
00198 }
00199 
00200 /*
00201  * Get the integer value of a key.
00202  */
00203 bool SMDFileData::GetIntValue(std::vector<CIniFile::Record>& records, std::string section, std::string key, int& value)
00204 {
00205         CIniFile::Record* record = FindRecord(records, section, key);
00206         if (record == 0)
00207                 return false;
00208         value = atoi(record->Value.c_str());
00209         return true;
00210 }
